channel.title: Linux on Home

item.title: Ubuntu/Debian Server 修改DNS
item.description: sudo apt install resolvconf sudo systemctl enable --now resolvconf.service 令以后，修改 /etc/resolvconf/resolv.conf.d/head 文件的内容，格式如下: nameserver 1.1.1.1 nameserver 2606:4700:4700::1111
